resources.string: This is the tab to switch among the currently active, inactive and all devices available for your home!

Welcome to IoT Controller. Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information. 
 Information Collection:
 We collect usage data, including:
 
 Device information:
 MAC address
 Pages viewed
 Information Use
 We use your information to:
 
 Provide and improve services
 Analyze usage
 Information Sharing
 We only share your information:
 
 For legal reasons
 Data Security
 We protect your data but cannot guarantee complete security.
 
 Your Choices
 You can:
 
 Update your information
 Opt-out
 Contact us at innovativesolutions@gmail.com for these requests.
 
 
 Policy Changes:
 We may update this policy. Changes will be posted in the app.
 
 Contact Us
 Questions? Contact us at:
 
 innovativesolutions.com
 innovativesolutions@gmailcom
 +92 1111111111
 
 Thank you for using IoT Controller.
